description: Ron cant get his tv working to watch the football game. He calls Cody over to see if he can fix it. Cody takes a look and asks if Ron is just trying to get outta there football bet, because he cant seem to find anything wrong with the tv connections. Ron admits he just wanted Cody to bend over in front of him. After this it appears all bets are off as Ron pulls Cody by the waistband of his pants into him. They take turns sucking each others cocks. Then they gradute to fucking. They are so involved they dont even realize that they miss the game. But the final score appears to be tied as both of these teams scored and won.
title: Long Dong
